title: Landing Page Parallax Effect and Animation Rendering
description: Verify that the landing page loads with engaging parallax scrolling effects and animated components functioning smoothly.

steps.description: Navigate to the landing page.
Confirm parallax scrolling effects trigger appropriately during page scroll.
Validate all animated components render correctly and animate without performance degradation.

title: Dashboard User Login and Access
description: Ensure users can log in successfully and access the dashboard area where they can manage ML projects without full page navigation.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid user credentials.
Submit login form.
Check login is successful.
Verify dashboard area loads without page navigation.

title: Data Upload for All Supported Formats with Type Inference and Preview
description: Verify that the user can upload datasets in supported formats (CSV, Excel, Parquet, Avro, XML, YAML), preview the data, and system correctly infers data types.

steps.description: Navigate to data upload panel on the dashboard.
Upload a CSV file.
Verify dataset preview renders with correct data.
Check data types inferred correctly for all columns.
Repeat upload, preview and type inference validation for Excel, Parquet, Avro, XML, and YAML files.

title: PII Detection and Consent Enforcement on Dataset Upload
description: Check that datasets containing PII trigger warning messages and system enforces user consent before allowing further actions.

steps.description: Upload a dataset containing PII fields.
Verify the system detects PII in the dataset.
Confirm that warning messages about PII are displayed prominently.
Attempt to proceed without providing consent.
Check that the system prevents further actions without user consent.
Provide consent and retry the action.
Verify the system allows continuation after obtaining consent.

title: Prompt Validation in Insight Hub
description: Verify that prompt inputs in Insight Hub enforce a minimum length and block forbidden patterns before submission.

steps.description: Open the Insight Hub panel.
Input a prompt shorter than minimum allowed length.
Verify an inline validation error prevents submission.
Input a prompt containing forbidden patterns.
Verify the prompt is blocked and a validation message is shown.
Input a valid prompt meeting all criteria.
Confirm the prompt is accepted and submission proceeds.

title: Model Training Job Submission and WebSocket Connection Establishment
description: Validate successful submission of model training jobs returning valid task IDs and establishing WebSocket connections for real-time streaming.

steps.description: Trigger model training job submission with valid parameters.
Verify the response contains a valid task ID.
Confirm that a WebSocket connection is established for this task.

title: Real-time Streaming of Training Metrics, Logs, and Checkpoints
description: Verify live WebSocket streaming updates training metrics charts, logs feed, and checkpoints dynamically on the dashboard.

steps.description: Start a model training session with an active WebSocket connection.
Validate that training metrics charts update live during training.
Confirm real-time logs feed shows training event logs continuously.
Check that checkpoint events appear in the UI as training progresses.

title: Training Completion Event Handling and UI Updates
description: Verify that upon training completion event, UI updates accordingly to reflect job completion and enables user next steps.

steps.description: Complete a model training job triggering training completion event.
Confirm UI reflects training completion status and stops live updates.
Verify that artifact metadata becomes available for user access.

title: Artifact Export with Payment Gating and Checksum Verification
description: Test the secure artifact export workflow including payment gating, checksum verification on artifact download, and audit log update.

steps.description: Select a completed model artifact for export.
Verify payment gating prompts the user for payment before export.
Complete payment confirmation.
Trigger artifact download.
Check that downloaded artifactâ€™s SHA256 checksum is verified against expected value.
Verify audit logs record the export action with user and timestamp.

title: Automated QA Testing Trigger and Report Generation
description: Check that users can trigger automated QA testing for robustness, calibration, and fairness on trained models and that reports are generated correctly.

steps.description: Trigger automated QA testing on a selected trained model.
Verify job submission for QA testing is accepted.
Confirm generation of robustness, calibration, and fairness reports upon test completion.
Check reports are accessible from the model test panel.

title: Audit Log Comprehensive State Mutation Capture
description: Ensure audit logs capture all state changes in the application, including user identity and timestamps for traceability.

steps.description: Perform various operations: dataset upload, training job submission, model export.
Verify corresponding audit log entries are created with accurate user information.
Check timestamps on audit logs correspond to real operation times.

title: State Recovery via Replay API on Page Reload and Worker Failures
description: Validate that after a page reload or worker failure, the UI state and data are restored correctly via event replay API providing seamless user experience.

steps.description: Initiate a training session with live metric streaming.
Reload the dashboard page or simulate a worker failure.
Verify the UI state is restored accurately using the event replay API.
Confirm live metrics and logs resume streaming without data loss.

title: Security Compliance Checks on Prompt and Exported Data Handling
description: Ensure raw prompts are not stored in logs, audit logs are encrypted, and consent enforcement for PII exports is strictly applied.

steps.description: Submit prompts via Insight Hub for model testing and explanation.
Verify raw prompt texts do not appear in any audit or training logs.
Check that audit logs are stored encrypted.
Attempt to export data containing detected PII without consent.
Confirm export is blocked and consent is enforced.

title: Insight Hub UI Behavior and Prompt Bar Focus
description: Check that the Insight Hub opens in-place without navigation, with the prompt bar auto-focused and top controls hiding smoothly on scroll.

steps.description: Open the Insight Hub panel from Dashboard.
Verify that the page does not navigate or reload.
Confirm that the prompt input bar is auto-focused for immediate text entry.
Scroll within the Insight Hub panel.
Check that the top control row hides with smooth animation while scrolling down.

title: UI Component Library Consistency and Accessibility Checks
description: Validate key UI components built with shadcn/ui and Radix UI for consistent styling, functionality, and accessibility compliance.

steps.description: Render components including buttons, dialogs, inputs, selects, tables, toasts, and tooltips.
Verify styling is consistent across components with correct themes applied.
Test keyboard navigation and screen reader accessibility for each component.
